name: These Lazy Sundays
description:
It’s just another one of those lazy Sundays, and it’s your job to make sure it stays that way.

There are all sorts of nuisances that can disrupt your human and it’s a dog’s duty to put a stop to them before they cause too much stress.

Objects will highlight pink when they are causing stress. Click on them and fix the issue as quick as possible to stop stress levels getting too high.

Winner of the Opera GX New Year Game Jam 2023!
